content: in this video you re going to learn how to make this fluffy baby yoda friend from the mandalorian this project comes with a free pattern and a lot of details that will make your baby grogu come to life you re going to learn how to make the robe of the alien its ears and the kawaii anime eyes this is a perfect present for all your star wars-obsessed friends materials 6mm crochet hook you can use smaller or bigger crochet hook depending on your yarn green brown and cream yarn i used himalaya dolphin baby 2 75mm crochet hook for the sport yarn black and white sport yarn for the eyes i used yarnart jeans yarn needle for sewing fiberfill scissors stitch marker pins ✨ stitch tutorials ✨ magic_ring - https //youtu be/4pxttsaufy8 single_crochet - https //youtu be/omqzsqhoztu increase - https //youtu be/ddneznetcng decrease - https //youtu be/bmqug1ngtbm f/o - https //youtu be/nrrvisgxv0y slip_stitch - https //youtu be/lwjql2-ecik blo - https //youtu be/wvnjc29hnc8 half_double_crochet - https //youtu be/xh0wtnivlsw
